targets.rawSql:
WITH ranked_messages AS (
  SELECT 
  date, countrycode, newconfirmedperpop, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY countrycode ORDER BY date DESC)-1 AS rn
  FROM covid19 
)
SELECT 
UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONVERT_TZ(`Date`, '+00:00', @@session.time_zone)) as time_sec,
countrycode as metric, 
sum(newconfirmedperpop/10) as total,
floor(rn/14) as rn_div14
FROM ranked_messages
